    • Method Detail

      • determineLength

        public static double determineLength(java.util.List<PointXY> path)
        Determine the length of a set of points/path.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to determine the total length of.
        Returns:
        the total length of the path.

      • optimize

        public static java.util.List<PointXY> optimize(java.util.List<PointXY> path)
        Optimize a path by removing collinear points. This reduces the size of the path, and, in some cases, reduces the length of the path by allowing your robot to move in ways it wouldn't be able to have previously.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to optimize.
        Returns:
        an optimized path.
